attributes.action: Cease the purchase of Compulsory Home Improvement Packs (HIPs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ensure that the housing market is stimulated by the immediate removal of the  Compulsory Home Improvement Packs (HIPs)requirement before selling a property.
These HIPs are not necessary and only last for 12 months!
What a costly expense for the house seller and a further tax on the hard working family who strive to improve their living standards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
